BOX Gecko the problem is not their penetration into the F500 The problem is that they are pivoting to sell into regulated industries that requirevalue the additional certs audits and featurefunctionality This is Boxs moat and competitivedifferential advantages that justify a premium for Box over the competition Otherwise Boxs core market EFSS is being rapidly commoditized The issue w this strategy is that these are multiyear sales cycles You cant pushnudge these industries into buying based on your timeline these entities buy on their own timelines This is validated by Aaron himself on all of the recent CCs Thats why its a joke to bring in yet another exSalesforce guy who isntcant make a difference along this The pivot should be to sell the company to an established vendor like Cisco Amazon MS IBM SF Oracle etc that has preestablished relationships and who CAN actually make a difference when selling to regulated industriesShow More
